Number of ticks until the next discharge. Lower = faster. # 20 ticks = 1 second. Default: 100 (5 seconds)
config.attachablegrinder.prop.tossMultip:
Multiplier that is multiplied against Toss Power.
Default: 4
config.attachablegrinder.prop.grinderYie:
Each grinder will yield at least this many times before exploding.
Set to 0 for infinite.
Default: 8
config.attachablegrinder.prop.randomExtr:
Each grinder has a minimum chance to yield this many times.
Default: 8
Power at which the drop is tossed from the mob.
Default: 5
config.attachablegrinder.prop.explosionM:
Magnitude of explosion caused by failed grinding. Default creeper explosion magnitude is 300.
Default: 150
config.attachablegrinder.prop.disabledEn: Entities to disable from having the attachable grinder attached. By resource name (eg: minecraft:pig)
